author: Reuters Editorial
title: Amc Entertainment Holdings Inc. Announces Q4 Loss Per Share $2.14
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Amc Entertainment Holdings Inc:
* AMC ENTERTAINMENT HOLDINGS, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $2.14 * QTRLY NET LOSS INCLUDED ABOUT $310.0 MILLION EXPENSE RELATED TO TAX REFORM
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $1.41 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * AMC ENTERTAINMENT HOLDINGS - LIBERAL EXPENSING PROVISIONS ON CAPEX EXPECTED TO MINIMIZE CASH TAXES TO ABOUT $8 MILLION TO $10 MILLION/YEAR OVER NEXT 8 -10 YRS‍​ Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
